name: You are not alone (Galareteg)
description:
A small platformer, with a bit of story. Made in 7 days. If I had more time I would make a better ending and last level.
It's the third game I made (seccond one is not finished yet). Im happy with how it turned out. 

Controls: a, d - left, right movement; space - jump

Project made for Brackeys Game Jam, theme was "you're not alone".
